website_summaries.verdict: Tires come off easily making storing this product you probably won't use every day very easy.
pros: Has dual tie-ins, so you can haul two dogs at once
Padded base of the front door is comfortable for the dog
Features a water bottle pocket so your dog can have some hydration during the bike trip, too
cons: We recommend taking corners slowly (5 miles per hour or less) while using this to avoid tipping of the trailer

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old lab/pointer mix. I used to bring her everywhere with me, but she has terrible arthritis so it’s difficult to bring her out as much these days. She’s 65lbs and she fits well with the extra bed inside. So far I haven’t used it as a bicycle trailer, but I bought the extra kit to convert it into a stroller as well. Took her for her first walk in it this weekend and she absolutely loved it. I am looking forward to using it a lot this spring/summer!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Pet Trailer
customer_reviews.text: This pet trailer has added so much joy into the lives of my dogs and I. It's easy to assemble & has great features for storing and securing and is easy to tow. I recommend a professional bicycle maintenance technician to install the hitch if you have repetitive stress injury or inflammation in your hands. It needs to be seated very well. Bicycles do have a tow weight limit so purchasers may not be able to tow large or multiple dogs, even when a trailer is rated higher.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: well done
customer_reviews.text: really well made. definitely worth the money. great attention to detail. we've gone for miles & miles with no issues at all and our dog had a great time. (45lb Husky/Shepard/Collie mix) It took a 5 minute 'introduction' ride when we first got it for her to understand what was going on. After that, we rode for about 4 hours with no issues. easy to maneuver and plenty of options for ventilation, storage. we loved it so much we bought the stroller attachment a month later. our dog is 12- and on long hikes in flat areas, it's nice to go out long, and if she gets tired, put her in the stroller for the return!
customer_reviews.author: I. Curren

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great little cart. Bought it to pull our standard poodle behind our tandem bike. He is about 46 lbs right now but not quite full grown. Can't say that he loves it yet but he'll get there. We did a our first tandem rally and completed about 40 road miles totals for the weekend. Had absolutely no problems. We did buy a memory foam insert to absorb some of the bumps. He sits comfortably inside and unless we are climbing you hardly feel the extra weight. We haven't done much ridding with the screen open yet since he is new to the cart but the chin rest is going to work out really well for him.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: ... week & I must say that my bull terrier love it a bit more than me
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a week & I must say that my bull terrier love it a bit more than me. It is easy to set up & well constructed. Our dog is 53lb. With the cart & mat I am pulling almost 100lb. It makes for a good workout. our dog is a bit skittish so we used treats to get him in the first time. Now he sees just the bike & he is ready to go. We are both very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This doggy carrier is so easy to use! It’s durable and easy to clean. I like the moon roof and windows. My 3 pups love it. The only downfall is the price. My chiweenie Zero keeps jumping in it in the morning before I go to work because he loves it so much! I highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Quigs83

customer_reviews.title: This is the best. I use it to take my Golden Retriever ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. I use it to take my Golden Retriever places. He is 65 lbs and fits in just fine - I bought the pad too - I would recommend having the pad right away. This trailer is more expensive than others, but it is exceptional quality, highly recommend. You will not be disappointed if you get this one.
customer_reviews.author: lvbooks

customer_reviews.title: Carl, the pug, thinks he is a King in the trailer.  Very comfortable for both of us.
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this trailer on Cycle Oregon, a rider couldn't find a sitter for her dog so she had to come. 500 miles over hills and the dog loved it. I purchased one and my pug who is 13 now loves his trailer. He thinks he is king tut in it! I have all the accessories and use them. It is a top quality, easy to use and fold trailer. I love it. Highly recommend it. It will last forever! :)
customer_reviews.author: Carlyn Watson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: After much research I decided on the Novel DoggieRide. The product is of excellent quality. Very sturdy, light, and with safety features. Once the hitch is on the bike, the assembly is pretty much 3 steps. Assemble the cabin, attaching the wheels--just push them in--and finally hooking the assembly feature that goes from the trailer to the bike. I have a 33 lbs and 20 lbs terrier. To place the dog(s) inside hook the leash the the HARNESS--NOT COLLAR- and off you go. am jut getting them used to it, but I see it working out very well. EXCELLENT QUALITY AND VERY STURDY. MANY NICE FEATURES. EFFORTLESS TO ASSEMBLE AND PULL YOUR DOG(S)
customer_reviews.author: Marta Torres

customer_reviews.title: A breeze
customer_reviews.text: Long bike rides are a breeze. Run the dog them in the back she goes riding with her ears in the wind!
customer_reviews.author: sandiego

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Trailer!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before choosing this trailer, and it paid off. It is very well made, easy to assemble, very sturdy and rides well behind my bike. My 50-pound Dalmatian fits perfectly and she loves it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love this trailer
customer_reviews.text: I love this trailer! It has opened up whole new adventures for my pup and me. I added the luxury mat, cargo rack, and kickstand . My pup is a 60 lb lab/pit mix and he has plenty of space to curl up, but prefers sitting up with his head out to see the world go by. Love, love, love this trailer!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer big enough for dog and gear
customer_reviews.text: Great trailer big enough for dog and gear. Fits my trike. Easy to maneuver and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for our older dog
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our 13 year old lab that was having trouble getting around and she loves it! Only gave 4 out of 5 stars because it isn't quite tall enough for her even though her size measures within what they said would fit in the guidelines.
customer_reviews.author: M Jule Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic trailer! Took my dog about a week to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic trailer! Took my dog about a week to actually enjoy her rides but it's a great way to get to local trailheads without starting the car!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Baughman

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: It feels like there isn't anything behind me, even loaded with a 40lb dog- well worth the investment. Only wish it came in purple!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie P

customer_reviews.title: Good enough if you're not a serious cyclist
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a pretty detailed review of the DoggyRide after using it for about 200 miles with my 65lb Black Lab. You can read it at [...] I think for most people who want to take their dog up to the park, go for a ride around the block a few times, or other moderate to light usage that this trailer will work just fine. The build quality is decent and the price is right. It is, however, a bit on the heavy side, tends to tip your bicycle, makes your bicycle handle strangely, pretty much requires the 'optional' kickstand and isn't really suitable for any "long" rides (say, 20 miles or more).
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lott

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble and we were able to get our ...
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and we were able to get our pup adjusted to riding in it quickly. Definitely get the kickstand and the bed (unless you have another bed).
customer_reviews.author: Oval T

customer_reviews.title: Overall like product however I thought it would be more durable
customer_reviews.text: Bit pricy compared to other brands. I invested because of the prior reviews and was hoping it would be durable. Turns out my pit wasn't to thrilled about riding in the doggy ride and she managed to rip a whole in material and pop the zipper. I'm very upset considering this was her 1 st ride in it and I was hoping the parts were made to handle a dog of her size as stated in the summary paragraph for this item. This happened within the 1st 20 minutes of her ride although I had her out the entire day we spent 3 hrs riding. Is there cost effective way to replace the carriage material???
customer_reviews.author: Nadja Galloway

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: The DoggyRide Novel Bike trailer is a great product, very well made. My dogs weren't too keen on sitting next to each other at first in the trailer, but once they began to feel the breeze, they loved it! Now they will hop right in because they know they're about to go for a ride! The trailer is easy to pull as well. I am definitely not a hard-core cyclist, and I am able to pull the trailer with no problems. Handles well in curves as well.
customer_reviews.author: bleppity

customer_reviews.title: 80 lb golden, 30 mile round-trip commute.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well built. Well thought out engineering and design features. Great balance and handling at low and high speeds. Comfortable for my dog...but it may take some training to get them used to it. Relatively easy to assemble and I'm useless when it comes to assembling things. Customer service is second to none. I had an issue trying to attaching the trailer to a Stromer ST1 E-bike and the owner went to a local E-bike store to investigate solutions. Thank you Matthys!! You really can't go wrong with this purchase...the price is extremely reasonable for the quality and years of fun you'll have.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Shem Tov

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It is very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is very high quality. Not much more I can say about this. The only thing I can think to change is to include the rain cover.
customer_reviews.author: Steven_d_smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bringing Fido Along
customer_reviews.text: I like to ride my bike but I feel guilty leaving behind my two Yorkies. This gives me the opportunity to ride with them getting to go along too. Now I dont have to see those little eyes pleading to go with me as I can bring my babies along with me everywhere I can go on my bike and they are safe inside and cant get out.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkstermom

product_meta.title: DoggyRide Novel Dog Bike Trailer
product_meta.description:
Let your precious pooch ride in style in the luxurious Novel dog bike trailer. This bike trailer includes many upgrades to allow your dog to ride in greater comfort and in style. The Novel has the following upgraded features: frame made of aluminum alloy rather than steel making the trailer weigh 30-Poundwhich is 8-Pound lighter than the Original trailer, stainless steel spokes and hubs, quick release wheels, front padded headrest for your dog, reflective striping for added visibility, back pouch with water bottle holder pocket, zip-on side window rain screens to help protect your dog from the elements. Interior cabin dimensions are: 31.5-Inch L x 21-InchW x 25.5-Inch H and maximum recommended loading capacity is 110-Pound This trailer easily converts to a stroller, with optional kit, or can make a great camping companion when adding the cargo roof rack to transport additional items amd your dog can use the trailer as a crate in which to sleep once daily adventures are done. This product meets or exceed ASTM standards.

AMAZON.COM


BIKE WITH NOTHING BUT THE BEST TRAILER FOR YOUR DOG
RIDE IN LUXURY AND IN STYLE
Ride Safely and in Style From adventure dog to zen dog, any dog can be a DoggyRide dog. Just because a dog is large, small, ill or injured is no reason for it not to be able to continue to enjoy the sights, sounds and smells of the adventurous outdoors with you. 

Dutch Dog Design puts the health, comfort and safety of both you and your dog at top of mind when designing its DoggyRide brand of market leading dog bike trailers. 

The DoggyRide Novel bike trailer is the top of the line, luxury dog trailer for a dog that must have nothing but the best. Its roomy cabin size of 31.5" L x 21" W x 25.5" H makes this suitable for larger dog breeds such Samoyed, Labrador retrievers, border collies, or, multiple small dogs.The Novel is a luxurious, multi-faceted and multi-functional solution for enjoying the outdoors together with your dog. 

Enjoy the outdoors, togetherStaying true to its adaptable nature, the Novel bike trailer can be converted to a stroller or jogger-stroller with optional conversion kits. To make for a complete outdoors experience, accessory pieces can include a cargo roof rack for camping or public market adventures, a rain cover for rainy day rides, a kickstand which can add stability and act as a brake - especially when a larger dog weighing 60 lbs or more enters or exits, or a luxury pet mat to make for a cushioned and comfortable ride. When you're done adventuring for the day, the cabin can be folded and stored in its storage bag. Considering all of these options, this bike trailer is made to last a lifetime.

Enjoy a trip to the marketEnjoy camping togetherTo let your dog enjoy a multitude of riding options, the upper roof can be unzipped so that your dog can stick its head out of its own personal sunroof, or the entire front panel can be unzipped and rolled away to give you dog a wide open view of the adventure ahead. Leisurely dogs can even rest their heads on the padded headrest at the front opening.

Explore nature togetherMany people say, "My dog needs exercise, why should I buy him a bike trailer to sit in?"

Our answer to this is that yes, dogs certainly do need to get proper, regular exercise, just like their human caretakers. One safe way for a dog to be able to run alongside its bicycling owner is via the use of the Buddy hands free dog leash connector, which is a safe and simple way to connect one's dog to a bike. But, at the point when you still want to continue your bike ride, but your dog is ready for a rest, your dog can hop into its DoggyRide dog bike trailer and continue to enjoy the fresh air, beautiful views and adventure while relaxing in comfort and style while you continue your own outdoor adventures.

Additionally, as your dogs ages into its senior years, this trailer can easily convert to a dog stroller (with optional kit) so that no matter the age or physical condition of your dog, you will still be able to enjoy the outdoors, together.

Convert your trailer to a stroller for a lifetime solutionWHY DOGGYRIDE?
DoggyRide bike trailers are designed with the comfort and satisfaction of the dog and owner in mind. DoggyRide is a company that is proud of the fact that it listens to its consumers and continues to innovate, be inspired and improve its products. The products are made of high-quality materials and components, to keep your dog safe and healthy. These bike trailers are meticulously engineered in a manner that will best serve user needs. These concepts include having a lightweight frame for easier towing, centrally placed tow bar for improved balance and stability, multi-functional window screens, convertibility, eye-catching design, and more. 

ASSEMBLY
This bike trailer will arrive to you mostly pre-assembled. Upon receiving it, simply remove it from the box, fold up both side walls, move the interior cross bar arm, which is located along the roof, into place and lock the crossbar with the included silver detent pin. 

Now all that is left is attaching the wheels. The side wheels are quick release wheels which will attach or release by simply pushing the center axle button and either pushing on to attach or pulling off to remove. Finally the tow bar arm is attached at the front by first removing the front locking pin, inserting the tow bar into the front reception tube, then passing the locking screw through the bottom set of holes, repositioning the nut on the opposite side, then finally flipping the silver lever back to secure the locking pin into place. 

The small black bike hitch at the opposite end of the tow bar should be removed in order to be installed on the bike axle (or hitch adapter, if using the trailer with special bikes such as those with breezer dropout, internal hub gear, recumbent bikes, or others). Then the tow bar arm can be reconnected to the bike hitch.

Ready to use the trailer for another purpose, this time at home? The trailer easily converts to a crate for long car rides or home use by removing the wheels.

The overall product width of 30.5" is wide enough to be roomy for your dog(s) but still narrow enough to fit through most standard doorways.

UPGRADED FEATURES INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:
Large rear pouch and pocket for storage * Lightweight aluminum alloy frame allows for easier towing
 * Padded headrest for your dog at the front opening
 * Large rear pouch and water bottle pocket
 * Stainless steel spokes and hubs
 * Reflective striping on front and sides
 * Removable rain screens for side windows
 * Quick release wheels
 * Side supports keep your dog from leaning into rotating wheels

WHERE WILL YOU DOGGYRIDE TODAY?
 * Colors: Outdoors Green/Grey, Urban: Brick Red/Black
 * Dog size: maximum 26 in/65 cm shoulder height
 * Loading capacity: 110 lbs/45 kgs
 * Overall product weight: 30 lbs
 * Dimensions when folded flat: 31.5" L x 21" W x 4" H
 * Tire size: 20" quick release wheels
 * This product meets or exceeds ASTM safety standards
 * This trailer includes a safety flag and reflectors for added visibility and safety

Fold and store your Novel trailer when not in use
feature_bullets: Padded front headrest and additional front reflective striping
Large rear pouch with water bottle pocket
